short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Official text document code viewer helper

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We developed a program to make it easy to view example code in the official development documentation using developer tools. In the future, we plan to add convenient features to various sites as needed.
Currently, React's official documentation (https://ko.react.dev) supports an on/off function to broadly view example code, and will be added sequentially as necessary functions become available in the future.
